title: Stoneweaver

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Protect someone at night and sharpen your rocks.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Protecting someone will give them powerful defense.
- If you make your stones sharp, you will deal a basic attack to all visitors. This has a 1 night cooldown.
- You may protect yourself at night.
- You may only place sharp stones at your house once per game.

desc:
Post 473
*"Yo look it's Rokk's family all standing outside that house."*
